projects.title: Latin Square Tool
projects.bodyText:
- Project to create and validate Latin Squares.
 - Uses C to optimally create and validate the squares.
 - Click to learn more.

projects.title: Memory Allocator
projects.bodyText:
- A memory allocated develoed in C. 
 - Created my own versions of Malloc and Free which optimally allocated and free up memory.
 - Click to learn more.

projects.title: Red Black Tree Tool
projects.bodyText:
- A Java application that creates a Red Black Tree provided input.
 - Enables the user to add nodes to the tree that are automatically sorted as per red black tree standards.
 - Click to learn more.

projects.title: Travel Cordinator
projects.bodyText:
- The front end of a travel simulator that uses dijkstra to determin best paths.
 - Generates a map with airports and shows the user the most optimal flight path.
 - Includes a test file to ensure accuracy after changes are made.
 - Click to learn more.

projects.title: Banking App
projects.bodyText:
- Simple Java application that lays out a basic banking app.
 - Comes packaged with tests to ensure code works.
 - Can make withdrawls and deposits from the account as well as enabling the user to check balance.
